name: Red Planet: Adventure
description:
Hello everyone! 

I am guilefilou and now you can play a little game in Scratch 2 (it's my first game on scratch). you can download it to support me and have more content in the game!

(i have create Roblox on name "guilefrancais" . I AM NOT A CODER but i know a very little.)

Ver. 0.1:

- you can deplace your character

- you can use a user name if you want

- youhave a music

- the game is in french (sorry because i am french)

- Every content in the game was create by me

Thx to download it and enjoy the game!

Guilefilou
